overview:
Nima Akbarpour is presenter of the BBC’s technology programme Click, broadcast worldwide on BBC Persian TV.

He studied Computer Science at the Azad University of Lahijan (IRAN). He began writing for Chelcheragh weekly magazine and continued writing for Zigzag online (BBC i-learn project workshop magazine). He joined the BBC in September 2008 as producer and he became the presenter of Persian version of Click.
